DataElement.preferredName: Subject Hormone Replacement Therapy Last 5 Year Received Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown indicator whether subject has received HRT within the last 5 years.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Subject Hormone Replacement Therapy Last 5 Year Received
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed._RAEB: Treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A number with no fractional part.::5_The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._To take, accept, or got something offered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.:RAEB: Treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production.

Concepts.definition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.
Treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production.

Property.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A number with no fractional part.::5:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:To take, accept, or got something offered.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
